channel.title: Relentless - Bounty Hunter [508/525]
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/UYGMv.png[/img] [URL=http://z6.invisionfree.com/Relentless525]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://z6.invisionfree.com/Relentless525/index.php?showforum=2]Client Downloads[/URL] [URL=http://relentless525.webs.com/index.htm]Webclient(Play Now)[/URL]
[B]Relentless is back and better than ever now, and now we're in full swing.[/B]
[B]Bounty Hunter[/B]
The standard Bounty Hunter that you see on most servers is glitchy and simple.
Relentless features one of the best Bounty Hunter systems available which includes features such as:
- Assigns only targets who are actually in Bounty Hunter (common glitch on most servers) - Max Players with same target cap (Fix for "piling") - Low and Med craters added (standard BH systems only have High) - Bounty Score System with fully working Scoreboards(both Hunter and Rogue) - Fixed glitchy skull append system - Viewing Orbs fully working (even with Low and Med craters) - Fixed "BH Skulled" Glitch (Standard BH systems don't remove skull status when leaving) - Mandrith features a "Tutorial Dialogue" for people unfamiliar with Bounty Hunter
[B]Clan Chat[/B]
If you remember the old Relentless server, we had plenty of clans but we never had a proper fully coded Clan Chat.
Well I've made alot of improvments and it's pretty much flawless, here are some of the features:
- De-Registers players from Clan Chat upon logout - Clan Data saving/loading added - Clan requirments set by owner of clan, fully working - Current Clan saved to char files. Auto-joins clan upon login - Fixed glitches where users appear multiple times - Clan Ranks fully working - Kicking fully working ("Kick Req" can be set by owner) - LootShare fully working (With CoinShare option)
[B]Small Stuff[/B]
Sometimes the small things on a server can add up and add a more authentic feel to the server.
Here's some of the small things I've added:
- Purple Sweets (Heals Random 1-3 HP, Restores 10% Run Energy) - Accept Aid - Ancient Spellbook: Blood Spells (Perfect Healing Equation even with Multi [Barrage/Burst] attacks) - Perfect Switching - Chat Options (ex: Setting your "Private" to "Friends only shows you online to friends[Saves & Loads]) - Server Integrated AutoRestarter (Players recieve warnings before Restart) - Easter Ring - Bonus PK Point Weekends (Every weekend it's automatically enabled) - Ring of Stone - Ground Spawns (items spawn on ground around server) - Most Damage Gets Drop (both PvP and PvM) - Poison - Modern Spellbook: Enfeeble Spell (Reduces Opponents Strength by 10%) - Modern Spellbook: Stun Spell (Reduces Opponents Attack by 10%) - Modern Spellbook: Iban Blast(Req 50 Mage, Maxhit 25) - Anti-Poison (All work, immunity timers and warning messages too) - Fully Working Make-over Mage - Trade Overflow Glitch Fixed (Previously when trading more items than your "trade partner" could carry, the extra items were simply lost) - Christmas Cracker (w/ Warning Message) - Modern Spellbook: Confuse Spell (Reduces Opponents Attack by 5%) - Modern Spellbook: Weaken Spell (Reduces Opponents Strength by 5%) - Modern Spellbook: Curse Spell (Reduces Opponents Defence by 5%) - Rubber Chicken (You can whack other players and use the "Dance" option) - Divine and Elysian Effects (I was the one who released the snippet) - Modern Spellbook: Vulnerability Spell (Reduces Opponents Defence by 10%) - Underground Wilderness Zones (Under Agility Course, Stairs South-West of Magebank) - Veteran Status (Join date is saved first login, Time-Date Handling system calculates difference) - Ancient Spellbook: Smoke Spells (Poisons) - Ancient Spellbook: Shadow Spells (Lowers attack level) - Real KBD Attack Effects (Ice/Freeze, Poison, Shock/Stun) - Combination Rune Support (Lava, Dust, Mist, ect.) - Infinite Rune Supply Staffs (Staff of Air provides infinite Air Rune) - Ring of Wealth (Increased chance of good drops when wearing)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zDxEi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JpMp0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mLgCw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NYNLH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Z4b1Q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rmT16.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8OnzD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/357evia.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Relentless - Bounty Hunter [508/525]
item.dc:creator: @MikeeIsFtw MikeeIsFtw
item.description:
@MikeeIsFtw wrote:

You got me! Based the whole server around your username

Lol jk ofcourse… server’s been around since like 2008… the old owner came up with the name.

UPDATES

Bank PIN System Totally Re-Coded

I’ve re-coded the Bank PIN system to be more like RuneScape’s.

Before when I added them they worked fine but they were a “simple version”.

The system now supports Recovery Delays, Pin Set Delay, Confirmation Menus Added, ect.

Here’s a new video showing how it works

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mv4oa1yFlRs

Customized Starter

For too long the starter package has been too simple.

I’ve decided to spice the starter package up a bit.

First you are informed that you will get to choose some extra items and that you will only get to choose once.

You then get to choose a free untradeable PK Point item.

You are then asked what your preffered style of combat is.
(This is used to decide what type of “extra noob gear” will be added to your starter)

You are then informed that I am the owner of Relentless…

…and are given an option to join my clan chat

Once you decide to join my clan chat or not you are then given your starter.

The base of the starter is 25M coins, 50 Falador & Varrock Teletabs, and 500 Manta Rays.

In addition I said my preffered combat style was Melee so it gives me some rune armour and dragon weapons.

I also chose Fire Cape as my free PK Point item and as you can see that was also added to my starter package.

Webclient

Added webclient like a week ago
(People told me players are more likely to play if you have one?)

If you would like to try out the webclient then click here: http://mikee.cwahi.net/relentless.php

Vote4Cash

Vote4Cash has been added.

Voting link: http://mikee.cwahi.net/vote.php

Donators & Veterans get extra cash each vote

Everyone gets extra cash each vote on Bonus Weekends

Read full topic

Also finished Clan Chat system when I added lootshare and coinshare.

Can you compile the JAR with JDK 6 next time? People with JDK 6 can’t run JDK 7-compiled applications, but people with JDK 7 and JDK 6 can run JDK 6-compiled applications.
[/quote]

Not sure how to get old versions of JDK[/quote]

JDK 6 update 35:
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6u35-downloads-1836443.html

Other downloads are here (scroll down a bit):
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html

item.title: Relentless - Bounty Hunter [508/525]
item.dc:creator: @MikeeIsFtw MikeeIsFtw
item.description:
@MikeeIsFtw wrote:

[CENTER]
Forums
Client Downloads
Webclient(Play Now)

Relentless is back and better than ever now, and now we’re in full swing.

Bounty Hunter

The standard Bounty Hunter that you see on most servers is glitchy and simple.

Relentless features one of the best Bounty Hunter systems available which includes features such as:

  • Assigns only targets who are actually in Bounty Hunter (common glitch on most servers)
  • Max Players with same target cap (Fix for “piling”)
  • Low and Med craters added (standard BH systems only have High)
  • Bounty Score System with fully working Scoreboards(both Hunter and Rogue)
  • Fixed glitchy skull append system
  • Viewing Orbs fully working (even with Low and Med craters)
  • Fixed “BH Skulled” Glitch (Standard BH systems don’t remove skull status when leaving)
  • Mandrith features a “Tutorial Dialogue” for people unfamiliar with Bounty Hunter

Clan Chat

If you remember the old Relentless server, we had plenty of clans but we never had a proper fully coded Clan Chat.

Well I’ve made alot of improvments and it’s pretty much flawless, here are some of the features:

  • De-Registers players from Clan Chat upon logout
  • Clan Data saving/loading added
  • Clan requirments set by owner of clan, fully working
  • Current Clan saved to char files. Auto-joins clan upon login
  • Fixed glitches where users appear multiple times
  • Clan Ranks fully working
  • Kicking fully working (“Kick Req” can be set by owner)
  • LootShare fully working (With CoinShare option)

Small Stuff

Sometimes the small things on a server can add up and add a more authentic feel to the server.

Here’s some of the small things I’ve added:

  • Purple Sweets (Heals Random 1-3 HP, Restores 10% Run Energy)
  • Accept Aid
  • Ancient Spellbook: Blood Spells (Perfect Healing Equation even with Multi [Barrage/Burst] attacks)
  • Perfect Switching
  • Chat Options (ex: Setting your “Private” to "Friends only shows you online to friends[Saves & Loads])
  • Server Integrated AutoRestarter (Players recieve warnings before Restart)
  • Easter Ring
  • Bonus PK Point Weekends (Every weekend it’s automatically enabled)
  • Ring of Stone
  • Ground Spawns (items spawn on ground around server)
  • Most Damage Gets Drop (both PvP and PvM)
  • Poison
  • Modern Spellbook: Enfeeble Spell (Reduces Opponents Strength by 10%)
  • Modern Spellbook: Stun Spell (Reduces Opponents Attack by 10%)
  • Modern Spellbook: Iban Blast(Req 50 Mage, Maxhit 25)
  • Anti-Poison (All work, immunity timers and warning messages too)
  • Fully Working Make-over Mage
  • Trade Overflow Glitch Fixed (Previously when trading more items than your “trade partner” could carry, the extra items were simply lost)
  • Christmas Cracker (w/ Warning Message)
  • Modern Spellbook: Confuse Spell (Reduces Opponents Attack by 5%)
  • Modern Spellbook: Weaken Spell (Reduces Opponents Strength by 5%)
  • Modern Spellbook: Curse Spell (Reduces Opponents Defence by 5%)
  • Rubber Chicken (You can whack other players and use the “Dance” option)
  • Divine and Elysian Effects (I was the one who released the snippet)
  • Modern Spellbook: Vulnerability Spell (Reduces Opponents Defence by 10%)
  • Underground Wilderness Zones (Under Agility Course, Stairs South-West of Magebank)
  • Veteran Status (Join date is saved first login, Time-Date Handling system calculates difference)
  • Ancient Spellbook: Smoke Spells (Poisons)
  • Ancient Spellbook: Shadow Spells (Lowers attack level)
  • Real KBD Attack Effects (Ice/Freeze, Poison, Shock/Stun)
  • Combination Rune Support (Lava, Dust, Mist, ect.)
  • Infinite Rune Supply Staffs (Staff of Air provides infinite Air Rune)
  • Ring of Wealth (Increased chance of good drops when wearing)


JpMp0.png761×400


NYNLH.png764×455




357evia.png728×331
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
